ComicInfo.Title: One Good Turn Deserves Another; Dining at the Taco Emporium; Digi-Money; Star Dreck: Voyeur; These Will True-ly Crack You Up!; TV: Then & Now; Internet Dating Warning Signs!!; Computer Shut-Ups; Chip Hacker Computer Nerd; Computer Crack-Ups!; Cracked DVDs!; Sim-Sations!; The Soapranos; Cracked's Latest Yarn about Mr. Precious; Cannibal!
ComicInfo.Summary: Cracked suffered a publication delay during the Fall of 2001 after the anthrax attack on American Media's Florida corporate headquarters. The delay caused a loss of shelf-space and eventual cancellation due to poor sales. Magazine was revived by Cracked Entertainment, Inc. as a purely non-comic humor/satire magazine, whose website debuted in October 2005 and the first new issue in August 2006.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:37:17. [Issue ID 250716]
